Name

Crit Effect

Type

Crushed Intestines

Normal damage. The target is wounded 2 and enfeebled 2 until it is no longer wounded.

Bludgeoning

Lodged in the Bone

The target takes 1d6 persistent bleed damage.

Piercing

Severed Spine

The target must succeed at a Fortitude save or be paralyzed until healed.

Slashing

Psychic Overflow

The target takes 1d8 mental damage.

Bomb or Spell
